front.title: Use of Hybrid Public-Key Encryption (HPKE) with CBOR Object Signing and Encryption (COSE)

abstract.t: This specification defines hybrid public-key encryption (HPKE) for use with CBOR Object Signing and Encryption (COSE). HPKE offers a variant of public-key encryption of arbitrary-sized plaintexts for a recipient public key. HPKE works for any combination of an asymmetric key encapsulation mechanism (KEM), key derivation function (KDF), and authenticated encryption with additional data (AEAD) function. Authentication for HPKE in COSE is provided by COSE-native security mechanisms. This document defines the use of the HPKE base mode with COSE. Other modes are supported by HPKE but not by this specification.
